claims.claim: Access to therapy and counseling is crucial for rehabilitation.
claims.quote: Yeah. So, you know, now I have a therapist. Now I'm connected to [...] resources and counselors

claims.claim: Inviting experts for training and resource sharing is beneficial for reentry programs.
claims.quote: We invite them in to come talk, we invite them. We had a Narcan training here.

claims.claim: Narcan training is essential in saving lives among youth in reentry programs.
claims.quote: We had a Narcan training here. I could save a life. Yeah. Mm-hmm. I could save a life.

claims.claim: Reentry programs should focus on equipping participants with practical skills to assist others.
claims.quote: Yeah. Mm-hmm. I could save a life. [...] just getting the experts to be able to come and say, Here are these resources. Here are the things that you didn't know we're here and this is how you can help someone else.

claims.claim: Connecting individuals with reentry resources gives them a better chance at success.
claims.quote: just finding the resources and putting them in front of these babies to be able to. Have a fighting chance.
